entries.name: Sundering
entries: The weapon has qualities that crush or pierce armor, making it more effective against targets that employ such defenses. When you attack a target wearing armor components with the Hard property, or natural armor and its armor AC is 15 or more, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the value in parenthesis.

baseitem.name: Shield
entries: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.
